entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening then light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
